metadata.title: CVE-2024-44944 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: ctnetlink: use helper function to calculate expect IDDelete expectation path is missing a call to the nf_expect_get_id()helper function to calculate the expectation ID, otherwise LSB of theexpectation object address is leaked to userspace.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
